name: Surtr, the Incinerating Giant
text:
Break: Put this card into your hand. When this card is a summon spell players cannot chase cards with total cost 4 or less. Continuous: This card cannot be targeted by spells with total cost 4 or less or abilities on a card with total cost 4 or less. Continuous: At the end of your recovery phase, pay
2
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
